tool_description: TravelPD offers b2b and b2c booking portals, booking engines, travel API integration services for travel companies such as Travel Agents, Tour Operators, DMC’s, TMC’s and Wholesalers at affordable pricing.
name: Travel API's
title: Travel API's

api_list.name: B2B Travel portal development with API integration
api_list.description: TravelPD offers affordable travel portal development solutions with travel API integration and travel portal software.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://travel-api-s.p.rapidapi.comb2b-travel-portal-development.p.rapidapi.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "travel-api-s.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
